name: file-explorer

scripts.dev: bun run dev:be & bun run dev:fe
scripts.build: bun run --cwd be-elysia build && bun run --cwd fe-vue build
scripts.test: bun run test:be && bun run test:fe
scripts.lint: bun run lint:be && bun run lint:fe

description: Windows Explorer clone with Clean Architecture using Elysia.js and Vue.js
